screen_desc: The screenshot shows a gallery app where it displays that there are no photos. There is a camera icon, a message "No photos", and instructions to take a picture. There are also navigation buttons at the bottom for Photos, Albums, Assistant, and Sharing.

action_plan: Check the albums within the app to see their creations saved in Google Photos
action_desc: click on the menu icon (often represented by three horizontal lines, also known as the 'hamburger' icon) located at the top left.
action_result: The last action of clicking on the "Search your photos" bar has taken you to the search results screen where you can find your photos. This is a step towards finding your creations saved in Google Photos, as you will need to search for them by name or other criteria.
